creditline: Lent by DRG, DRG Collection and Darwin and Geri Reedy
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: dog with open mouth; wood covered with a reddish-brown mud-like substance on body; 2 tubular objects sticking out of either side of mouth; mirrored eyes; cord around neck with bell hanging from it; one round hump of back and one hanging from underside; short tail curled upwards; white pigment on face; nail protruding from underside between front legs; 3/4 in. Dia. hole on front of upper hump
title: Dog Figure
